alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Keokuk; Van Buren; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:46AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Keokuk, southwestern Washington, northern Van Buren and Jefferson Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 846 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Delta to near Ottumwa. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hedrick, Batavia, Martinsburg and Hayesville around 900 AM CDT. Libertyville around 905 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Packwood, Douds, Richland, Birmingham, Stockport, Brighton and Pleasant Plain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
